header_text: Attractive person on social media: Thoughts

elements.text:
While scrolling through a dating app, you see an attractive person you met at the grocery store last week. You decide to like their profile. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I hope we can continue the great conversation we started at the store.
I wonder if they think I am attractive, but remind myself that looks aren't everything.
I think about how we could go on a date.
I think about whether they'll think my photos are silly, but then remind myself that I'm proud of my profile.
This person will think I'm weird for liking their profile.
